node.title: HK Stock Real-Time Monitoring Desktop App
node.subtitle: February 2018
node.longerDescription: At that time I was pretty obsessed about making a desktop app for myself to monitor stock price. That's why this product was born and implementing UI through Python QT is definitely not a good experience. The best part would be I am able to download a csv files about all stocks within certain percentage range from their 52-weeks low price.
